oathauth-account:
Plain text associated with [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication] on this wiki (username@<wiki name>) found on Special:OATH.
{{Identical|Account name}}
oathauth-secret:
Plain text found on Special:OATH while enabling OATH

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-enable:
Page title on Special:OATH, when enabling OATH.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-scratchtokens: Plain text, found on Special:OATH while enabling OATH.
oathauth-token:
HTMLForm label, found on [[Special:OATH]], when verifying OATH.
{{Identical|Token}}
oathauth-disable:
Page title on Special:OATH while disabling OATH.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-validatedoath:
Plain text found on Special:OATH after a token has been validated.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-noscratchforvalidation:
Plain text found on Special:OATH if the user used the incorrect type of token while enabling OATH.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-failedtovalidateoath:
Plain text found on Special:OATH when validation of a token has failed.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-disabledoath:
Plain text found on Special:OATH when disabling OATH has been successful.

See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_factor_authentication two factor authentication]
oathauth-step1: Label for step 1 on Special:OATH form
oathauth-step1-test: Text for step 1 on Special:OATH for. Check the name of "Google Authenticator" in your language in the Play Marketâ€”it's quite likely that it's translated.
oathauth-step2: Label for step 2, the QR code, on Special:OATH
oathauth-step2alt: Label for information on how to manually do step 2 on Special:OATH
oathauth-step3: Label for step 3 information on Special:OATH
oathauth-step4: Label for step 4 information on Special:OATH
oathauth-entertoken: Label on input field on Special:OATH asking user to enter token
oathauth-auth-token-label:
Label of the second-factor field on special pages and in the API
{{Identical|Token}}
oathauth-auth-token-help: Extended help message for the second factor field in the API.
oathauth-auth-ui: Shown on top of the login form when second factor is required
oathauth-throttled:
Error message when throttling limit is hit.

Parameters:
* $1 - throttle block duration
oathauth-login-failed: Error message when verifying the second factor failed.
oathauth-describe-provider: Description of the extension as an authentication provider.
